summary: curacao drew 2-2 in a second-leg match at montserrat to win 4-3 on aggregate . patrick kluivert has helped curacao progress to the next stage . kluivert 's mother is from curacao , was a world cup losing semi-finalist in 1998 .
aspect: 1. Patrick Kluivert makes a winning start in World Cup qualifying as coach of Curacao. 2. Curacao advanced to the second qualifying round in CONCACAF for the 2018 tournament. 3. Kluivert's team won 2-1 on Saturday in Willemstad, and will face Cuba in the next round.
explain: Patrick Kluivert, who is the coach of Curacao, has made a winning start to his qualifying journey for the FIFA World Cup 2018. Curacao has advanced to the second qualifying round in CONCACAF, and won 2-1 at home. In the next round, they will face Cuba. The team's previous tie against Montserrat, where they won 4-3 on aggregate with a two - two draw at Montserrat, was essential in moving forward.
